Description: Fragment of strap handle of a North Greek pottery transport amphora. Red paint. Clay medium, micaceous, buff-brown. Circular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 101a, 11. Compare the amphora from Chalki, Grace, BCH Supplement 13, 555, figs 10 and 13.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0043)
